### Main Ingredients
- Sushi rice

### How to Store Salmon Rolls
The webpage provides a section on storing the salmon rolls, although the specifics aren't visible in this screenshot. Typically, sushi rolls can be wrapped tightly in plastic wrap and stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for short-term storage.
